title: People Audience
description: A set of characteristics belonging to people, e.g. who compose an item's target audience.

requiredGender.title: Required Gender
requiredGender.description: Audiences defined by a person's gender.

requiredMaxAge.title: Required Max Age
requiredMaxAge.description: Audiences defined by a person's maximum age.

requiredMinAge.title: Required Min Age
requiredMinAge.description: Audiences defined by a person's minimum age.

suggestedGender.title: Suggested Gender
suggestedGender.description: The gender of the person or audience.

suggestedMaxAge.title: Suggested Max Age
suggestedMaxAge.description: Maximal age recommended for viewing content.

suggestedMinAge.title: Suggested Min Age
suggestedMinAge.description: Minimal age recommended for viewing content.
